item.title: Armaxis
item.description: INTRODUCTION Starting the challenge, we’re given two ports, corresponding to two components: a website and an web-based email client. The website presents a simple login/registration form, and the email client brings us straight into an inbox without any authentication: A quick skim through the website code suggests that this email client will probably be used for password resets. CODE ANALYSIS As usual, I like to read through the code sequentially, starting from startup/initialization code (the Dockerfile, then index.
